title: Hugging Rain Man: A Novel Facial Action Units Dataset for Analyzing Atypical Facial Expressions in Children with Autism Spectrum Disorder
details: Y Ji, S Wang, R Xu, J Chen, X Jiang, Z Deng, Y Quan… - arXiv preprint arXiv …, 2024
abstract: Children with Autism Spectrum Disorder (ASD) often exhibit atypical facial expressions. However, the specific objective facial features that underlie this subjective perception remain unclear. In this paper, we introduce a novel dataset …
